resources.string: This app is developed with <3 by Carlos Cepeda, you can support me by donating me! i hope youre enjoying this app as much as i developed it
When music is playing, use the Album art of the current playing song as wallpaper
Don\'t show notifications for the following apps:...
Don\'t show notifications from the apps selected, these won\'t appear in the status bar too, unless the notifications are Sticky notifications(that can\'t be removed by the system itself)
By default, current system wallpaper is used
You must allow this app to read Notifications first!
Answer directly from Notification to messages, as seen in Nougat and beyond
Show also notifications that can\'t be removed
You can\'t delete a sticky notification
Turn on screen if a new notification incomes
Turn on screen on device pick up
For better usage, turn off the default Android lockscreen
